name: The Dice Ain't Nice
description:
This Game Was Made For The GMTK Game Jam 2022

Theme was "Roll Of The Dice".

The plan was to have a "beat the clock" game, where the dice you rolled interfere with the players movement, stopping you from reaching your goal in time... However the game remains unfinished and buggy. This was my first Game Jam and I am open to all constructive criticism, hold nothing back. 

Please excuse the title in game. The official title is "The Dice Ain't Nice".

Made in 48hours by me SPIRITO (Solo Developer).

A couple of the sound FX were taken from freesound.org and edited.
